wikipedia_page.main: Paul Shaw (born 4 September 1973) is an English retired footballer who played as an attacking midfielder. He has also worked as a coach at F.C. New York and with Orlando City U-23.

response: *  Paul Shaw (2013–2015)Orlando City names Paul Shaw as U23 Head Coach
PaulShaw.jpg|Paul Shaw joined the club following the Gills' promotion in 2000 and spent four years at Priestfield

link_mentions.page: List of current Major League Soccer broadcasters

response: The team played its home games at Belson Stadium on the grounds of St. John's University in Jamaica, Queens. The club's colors were yellow and sky blue, and it was coached by former Arsenal player Paul Shaw, following the resignation of manager Matt Weston partway through the club's inaugural season.
